price: 24. Degenen die gierig zijn – en mensen tot gierigheid aanmoedigen –. En ieder die zich afkeert, dan Allah is rijk alle lofprijzingen waard.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَبۡخَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yabkhalūna wayamurūna al-nāsa bil-bukh'li waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
